review: Dr. Sridhar understands the patient problem in detail & treats accordingly. He is very patient, friendly. He pauses in between the treatment & enquires about patient anxiety & calms before he proceeds to next steps. Overall a very good experience & must visit for all dental problems. Regards, RR
